definition: deathbed struggle/final struggle (idiom)
to hang (down)/droop/dangle/bend down/hand down/bequeath/nearly/almost/to approach
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
see 掙扎|挣扎[zheng1 zha2]
to struggle to get free/to strive to acquire/to make (money)
to prick/to run or stick (a needle etc) into/jug (a classifier for liquids such as beer)
to tie/to bind/classifier for flowers, banknotes etc: bundle/Taiwan pr. [zha2]
variant of 紮|扎[za1]
penetrating (as of cold)/struggle
variant of 紮|扎[zha1]

sentences.english: It is a gift, a gift to the 22)throes of Mordor.
sentences.chinese: 这魔戒是送给垂死挣扎的魔朵的礼物。

sentences.english: The enemy became more frantic in its death-bed struggle.
sentences.chinese: 敌人更加疯狂地进行垂死挣扎。

sentences.english: The banks are now desperately scrabbling to recover their costs.
sentences.chinese: 为了弥补损失，银行现在只能垂死挣扎了。

sentences.english: The enemys dead bed struggles only accelerate their death.
sentences.chinese: 敌人的垂死挣扎只能加速他们的灭亡。

sentences.english: It is the statue of the "Dying Gaul".
sentences.chinese: 这是一尊“垂死挣扎的高卢人”的雕塑。
比如存在着忍饥挨饿的孩子或者垂死挣扎的母亲。

sentences.english: Then dying, after that crash at 80 miles an hour.
sentences.chinese: 然后她垂死挣扎，在时速80迈的撞车之后。

definition: dying
a cornered beast will still fight (idiom)/to fight like an animal at bay
to struggle on whilst at death's door (idiom)
to wait helplessly for death (idiom)/to resign oneself to extinction
to struggle
futile
to go all out for sth at risk of one's life
a mantis trying to stop a chariot (idiom)/to overrate oneself and attempt sth impossible/also written 螳臂擋車|螳臂挡车[tang2 bi4 dang3 che1]
lit. an arrow at the end of its flight (idiom)/fig. spent force
lit. the path exhausted, the end of the road (idiom); an impasse/in a plight with no way out/things have reached a dead end
remaining breath/last gasp
to behead/capital punishment/desperate struggle/life-and-death
hands tied and waiting to be captured
to sit and wait for death (idiom); resigned to one's fate
not reconciled to/not resigned to
lit. to strike a stone with egg (idiom); to attempt the impossible/to invite disaster by overreaching oneself
